ourQualities.title: QUALITY FOOD
ourQualities.description: Cuizines crafted with the finest ingredients and meticulous attention to detail by out finest chef's.

ourQualities.title: SUPER TASTE
ourQualities.description: flavors that delight your palate and leave you craving for more.

ourQualities.title: Book Reading
ourQualities.description: Enjoy vast variety of book available and enhance your experience here

ourQualities.title: Open-Mic Sessions
ourQualities.description: A perfect platform to share your incredible thoughts and ideas with the community

piz.title: The Epic Slice
piz.text: Simple yet classic combination of fresh tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, and aromatic basil on a perfectly baked crust.

piz.title: Hobbiten
piz.text: Loaded with a colorful assortment of fresh vegetables, including bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, olives, and tomatoes, all atop a gooey mozzarella base with tangy tomato sauce

piz.title: Farmhouse
piz.text: The rustic charm of our Farmhouse Pizza, bursting with multipal fresh ingridians Taking you to an adventure of Farm.,

piz.title: Secret Garden
piz.text: Generous layer of spicy, crispy pepperoni slices over a bed of melted mozzarella cheese and tangy tomato sauce

piz.title: Catch-8
piz.text: A perfectly baked crust, rich tomato sauce, and a generous layer of melted cheese. Cut into 8 hearty slices, each piece topped with a delicious blend of fresh ingredients and toppings of your choice.

piz.title: Volcano Rush
piz.text: Experience the eruption of flavor with Volcano Rush Pizza  a fiery feast that ignites your taste buds

piz.title: Treasure Hunt
piz.text: A flavorful combination of caramelized onions, red onions, and green onions atop a layer of gooey mozzarella cheese and tangy tomato sauce

piz.title: Green Gables
piz.text: A spicy kick with slices of fresh green chilies scattered over a bed of melted mozzarella cheese and zesty tomato sauce

sk.title: The Sunshine Sip
sk.text: Blended with ripe and juicy mangoes with creamy milk and a touch of sweetness, creating a refreshing and indulgent drink that's perfect for cooling down and satisfying your taste buds

sk.title: Cocoa Dreams
sk.text: Chilled, creamy blend of rich cocoa and smooth milk, served over ice. It’s a decadent, refreshing treat that combines the deep flavors of chocolate with a cool, satisfying finish

sk.title: Citrus Serenade
sk.text: Made from freshly squeezed and ripe juicy oranges, delivering a vibrant, tangy flavor with a boost of natural sweetness. It’s a refreshing and invigorating drink, packed with vitamin C

sk.title: The Frozen Delight
sk.text: Combines creamy vanilla ice cream with crushed Oreo cookies, blending into a rich, indulgent treat. Topped with whipped cream and extra cookie crumbles

sk.title: Banana Bliss
sk.text: Ripe bananas blended with creamy milk and a touch of honey, creating a smooth, naturally sweet, and refreshing drink. Perfect for a quick treat or a nourishing snack

sk.title: Berry Tales
sk.text: Ripe strawberries with creamy vanilla ice cream, creating a smooth, fruity, and indulgent treat. Topped with whipped cream and a hint of strawberry drizzle, it’s a delightful and refreshing beverage

sk.title: The Minted Manuscrip
sk.text: A refreshing cocktail combining muddled mint leaves, zesty lime juice, and a splash of soda water, with a hint of sweetness. It's a cool and invigorating drink, perfect for any occasion

sj.title: The Enigma
sj.text: Tender cubes of paneer simmered in a velvety tomato-based sauce with butter, cream, and a blend of aromatic spices. It's a comforting and indulgent dish, perfect with naan or rice

sj.title: Tikka Tempest
sj.text: Succulent chunks of marinated paneer grilled to perfection. Spiced with a blend of aromatic herbs and spices, it’s served with a side of tangy mint chutney for a flavorful, smoky delight.

sj.title: The Sizzling Pan
sj.text: Smoky, charred cubes of paneer cooked in a spicy, tangy tomato-based gravy. Infused with bold flavors and aromatic spices, this dish offers a fiery kick and a rich, satisfying taste

sj.title: The Green Odyssey
sj.text: Combining soft cubes of paneer with a vibrant, spiced spinach gravy. The creamy, flavorful sauce, enriched with a blend of Indian spices, complements the tender paneer for a satisfying and nutritious dish.

dt.title: The Sugared Edge
dt.text: layers of moist chocolate sponge cake, generously filled with a rich, velvety ganache made from premium dark chocolate. Topped with a glossy ganache glaze and adorned with chocolate shavings

dt.title: The Sweet Victory
dt.book: The Sweetness at the Bottom of the Pie
dt.text: light and fluffy vanilla sponge, infused with real vanilla beans for a rich. Finished with a smooth, creamy vanilla buttercream and elegantly decorated with fresh berries.

dt.title: The Frozen Delight
dt.text: Bowl of Chocolate Ice Cream features rich, creamy chocolate ice cream made with premium cocoa. Each scoop offers a velvety texture and intense chocolate flavor, making it a perfect treat for chocolate lovers

dt.title: Molten Dream
dt.text: Rich brownie served warm, topped with a scoop of creamy vanilla ice cream. The combination of the warm, gooey brownie with the cool, smooth ice cream creates a delightful contrast

dt.title: The Sweet Serenade
dt.text: Made from deep-fried dough balls soaked in a fragrant, warm sugar syrup infused with cardamom and rosewater. These sweet, syrup-soaked treats are soft and spongy, offering a delightful melt-in-your-mouth experience

dt.title: The Chocolate Chronicles
dt.text: Generous scoop of your choice of ice cream, layered with chocolate or caramel sauce and a sprinkle of nuts. Topped with whipped cream and a cherry, it’s a luxurious dessert that blends rich flavors and textures in every bite.

rc.title: The Mixed Blessing
rc.text: Cooked with a medley of fresh vegetables, aromatic spices, and herbs. Each grain of basmati rice is infused with the essence of cumin, cloves, and cardamom, creating a light and delicious mea

rc.title: The Savory Feast
rc.text: Tender pieces of vegetables, and a blend of fragrant spices such as saffron, cardamom, and cloves. Cooked to perfection and often garnished with caramelized onions and fresh herbs.

rc.title: The Golden Age
rc.text: Fluffy basmati rice infused with fresh lemon juice, aromatic curry leaves, and a hint of turmeric. Garnished with roasted peanuts and fragrant mustard seeds, it's a refreshing and zesty dish perfect for any occasion.

rc.title: The Culinary Affair
rc.text: Comforting and wholesome meal that pairs steamed basmati rice with a flavorful lentil curry.The dal cooked with aromatic spices like cumin, turmeric, and coriander creating a nourishing and delicious dish that’s perfect for everyday meals.

rc.title: Ramsis Special
rc.text: Cooked in the dum style, where ingredients are slow-cooked together in a sealed pot allowing the flavors to meld beautifully garnished with caramelized onions, fresh herbs, and a touch of yogurt.

rc.title: Greedy Matka
rc.text: long-grain basmati rice layered with marinated meat or vegetables, and a blend of spices like saffron, cardamom, and cloves. Slow-cooked to perfection

rc.title: Notorius Thieves
rc.text: A blend of rice and lentils, cooked together with spices such as cumin, turmeric, and ginger. This one-pot meal is soft, savory, and often served with a dollop of yogurt or pickle

rt.title: Plain Deal
rt.text: Cooked on a hot griddle. Its thin, soft texture and mild flavor make it a versatile and staple accompaniment to a variety of dishes, ideal for everyday meals

rt.title: The Naan Saga
rt.text: Brushed with butter or garlic. Its slightly crisp exterior and tender, airy interior make it a perfect accompaniment to rich curries and gravies

rt.title: The Crusty Conundrum
rt.text: A spiced mashed potato filling. Cooked to a crispy, golden perfection, this hearty paratha is typically served with yogurt, pickles, and a dollop of butter for a satisfying and flavorful meal

rt.title: The Cheese Chase
rt.text: Filled with melted cheese and seasoned with aromatic spices. The crispy, golden exterior contrasts with the gooey, cheesy interior, making it a delightful and indulgent treat

start.title: The Miniature Delight
start.text: corn pieces tossed with tangy tamarind chutney, spicy green chutney, and a mix of chaat spices. Garnished with fresh coriander, onions, and sev

start.title: The Ballad of Dahi
start.text: Crisp puris filled with a mixture of tangy tamarind chutney,spicy green chutney,and creamy yogurt. Topped with sev,explosion of flavors and textures in every bite.

start.title: Rolling Stones
start.text: Golden wrapper encases a savory mix of tender vegetables and aromatic spices, all paired with a zesty dipping sauce for an irresistible taste sensation

start.title: Little Pasta
start.text: Crafted from premium wheat and cooked to perfection, served with your choice of rich, flavorful sauces and fresh ingredients. Indulge in a delightful Italian culinary experience.

start.title: The Potato Famine
start.text: crispy potato patties that are Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Served with tangy chutneys and a sprinkle of fresh coriander, it's a delicious blend of textures and flavors

start.title: Taste-Dynamite
start.text: Crispy edible baskets filled with a vibrant mix of spiced potatoes, chickpeas, yogurt, tangy chutneys, and crunchy sev. Perfectly balanced flavors in every bite

start.title: The Fryer’s Tale
start.text: Golden and crispy, our French Fries are hand-cut and seasoned to perfection, offering a satisfying crunch and a burst of flavor in every bite. A classic favorite, ideal as a side or a snack

start.title: The Oriental Adventure
start.text: Vegetable meat balls, drenched in a savory, tangy sauce with hints of garlic, ginger, and soy. This flavorful dish combines a crunchy exterior with a rich, spiced coating for a delightful taste experience

sjs.title: Spicy Harvest
sjs.text: cooked in a spiced tomato-based gravy. Infused with a blend of aromatic spices such as cumin, coriander, and garam masala, perfect when paired with rice or naan

sjs.title: The Bean's Journey
sjs.text: simmered in a spiced tomato and onion gravy. The dish is enriched with a blend of aromatic spices, creating a hearty and flavorful meal that pairs perfectly with rice or roti

sjs.title: The Vegetable Tapestry
sjs.text: Seasonal vegetables, simmered in a spiced tomato and onion gravy. Enhanced with a blend of aromatic spices and fresh herbs

sjs.title: The Potato Diaries
sjs.text: Baby potatoes cooked in a rich and spicy tomato-based gravy simmered slowly to allow the spices and herbs to infuse deeply into the potatoes, creating a deliciously aromatic and hearty meal
